help-all: Listing all top-level commands and groups. Specify a command to see more information.
help-group-standalone: This group is a standalone command.
configuring-status-streaming: Latest response from the streams: {0} {0:minute|minutes} {1} {1:second|seconds} ago.
configuring-changed-domain: Domain for recent changes streams on this server was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-lang: Language of the bot on this server was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-translatewiki: Reports about recent changes on Translatewiki are enabled in the channel {0} for language **{1}**.
configuring-changed-translatewiki-channe: The channel for reports about recent changes on Translatewiki was changed to {0}.
configuring-changed-translatewiki-lang: The language for which the reports about recent changes on Translatewiki are compiled was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-wiki: Wiki for links on this server was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-wiki-channel: Wiki for links on this channel was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-reset: The value was reset back to default.
configuring-error-same: The value you entered is the same as the current one.
configuring-error-strange: Your command failed due to some strange error.
configuring-required-value:
The value for a parameter is required.
To get full help for the command, send `{1}help {0}`.
configuring-badvalue-domain:
Streams are available only for Wikimedia projects.
List of allowed domains: {0}.
configuring-badvalue-lang: The bot doesn’t recognise your input as a valid ISO 639 code.
configuring-badvalue-wiki: The bot cannot get API information for this wiki. There must be `{0}` at the end of your URL.
configuring-help-status: Check if the bot is operational.
configuring-help-domain: Change the domain from which recent changes are broadcasted on this server. Works only for Wikimedia projects.
configuring-help-domain-value: domain of a Wikimedia project (in en.wikipedia.org format). Use `-` to reset to default.
configuring-help-lang: Change the language of the bot on this server.
configuring-help-lang-value: the language of bot you want. Use `-` to reset to default.
configuring-help-translatewiki: Start or end reporting hourly about recent changes on Translatewiki in one of the channels.
configuring-help-translatewiki-channel: a channel that’s available to the bot.
configuring-help-translatewiki-value: language that’s available on Translatewiki for translation (language code in ISO 639). Fill `-` as a language to end reporting.
configuring-help-wiki: Change the main wiki for links on this server. /wiki/$1 at the end is required.
configuring-help-wiki-channel: Change the wiki for links on this channel. /wiki/$1 at the end is required.
configuring-help-wiki-value: the wiki you want (in <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/$1> format). Use `-` to reset to default.
linking-toolong: Links to the message above are not provided because the message would be too long for Discord.
streaming-opened: :white_check_mark: Stream {0} is added to the channel {1}{2}
streaming-edited:
:eight_spoked_asterisk: Stream {0} in the channel {1} has changed following parameters:
{2}
streaming-edited-nothing: :ok: Stream {0} in the channel {1} had no changes.
streaming-closed: :negative_squared_cross_mark: Stream {0} was removed from the channel {1}.
streaming-list-nothing: :ok: There are no opened streams on this server.
streaming-required-goal:
The stream goal (page title or namespace number) is required.
To get full help for the command, send `{1}help {0}`.
streaming-help-open: Start streaming recent changes in the channel.
streaming-help-edit: Edit parameters of a recent changes stream in the channel.
streaming-help-close: Stop streaming recent changes in the channel.
streaming-help-list: List all opened streams on this server.
streaming-help-channel: a channel that’s available to the bot.
translatewiki-deadline: Find time to check translations for this week **until 00:00** Monday UTC to avoid bad translations and vandalism to catch on.
